desc: Greatly boosts drop rate of HC when attacking

dictionary.lore: A treasure from the lost La Veda Republic that was upgraded. The techniques used to upgrade it are unknown, but their results were recorded in detail. One would equip this machine on the heart, stimulating the pleasure gained from battling on the field, and promoting physical recovery. It is also recorded that some of the wearers of this treasure went berserk, like a beast possessed by the moon.

name: Luna Creator
